name: Split Second (Phanttas)
description:
Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2019.

The theme for the game jam is "Only One", which inspired me to try and create a turn based game where you only have one second to act each turn. Wanting to avoid simply making a non-rhythmical 'Crypt of the Necrodancer' I opted to make it somewhat more action focused. I believe there are a number of other ways I could have achieved it, but I settled on this being an option that I could realistically implement into a game of sorts within the allotted 48 hours, since I was working alone, and this is my first ever game jam!

Hopefully you enjoy the result. I personally think it's a bit clunky, but fun enough to play a few rounds of! :)
